title: Linux: Recover Files From a Machine That Won't Boot
author: Jack Wallen
description: There are tons of software out there that claim to be able to recover your data from a dying drive or but why take a chance on purchasing something unproven? Here are a few options that don't cost anything.
cntitle: Linux：从无法启动的机器中恢复文件
cndescription: 市面上有很多软件声称可以从即将损坏的驱动器中恢复数据，但为什么要冒着购买未经验证产品的风险呢？以下是一些免费的选择。
